member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebDriverExtensions.WdFindElement(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds web element with driver in the DOM.
member.param: Time to wait for driver to find the web element. Default time is 10 seconds.
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebDriverExtensions.WdFindElements(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds web elements with driver in the DOM.
member.param: Time to wait for driver to find the web element. Default time is 10 seconds.
member.returns: List of web elements specified by locator.
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebDriverExtensions.WdHighlight(OpenQA.Selenium.By,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.Int32)
member.summary: Highlights founded element in the DOM.
member.param: Time to wait for driver to find the web element. Default time is 10 seconds.
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebDriverExtensions.WdMoveToElement(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By)
member.summary: Hovers founded element in the DOM.
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebDriverExtensions.WaitUntilElementIsInvisible(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Wait until element is invisible in DOM by its locator.
member.param: Locator pointing to the web element.
Time in seconds to wait for element become invisible. Default: 10 seconds
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebDriverExtensions.WdIsElementVisible(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if element is visible in DOM by its locator.
member.param: Locator pointing to the web element.
Time in seconds to wait for element become invisible. Default: 10 seconds
member.returns: True if element is visible or false if element is not visible.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebElementExtensions.WeHighlightElement(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver)
member.summary: Highlights founded web element in the DOM.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebElementExtensions.WeFindElement(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds element with web element in the DOM.
member.param: Locator pointing to the web element to find.
Time to wait for driver to find the web element. Default time is 10 seconds.
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebElementExtensions.WeFindElements(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds elements with web element in the DOM.
member.param: Locator pointing to the web element to find.
Time to wait for driver to find the web element. Default time is 10 seconds.
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebElementExtensions.WeGetAttributeValue(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.String)
member.param: Name of the web element property.
member.returns: Resturn web element property value as a string.

member.summary: Hovers founded element in the DOM.
member.param: Locator pointing to the web element to find.
member.exception: Driver finding the web element timeouts after the specified time.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebElementExtensions.WeIsElementVisible(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if element is visible in DOM by its locator.
member.param: Locator pointing to the web element to find.
Time in seconds to wait for element become invisible. Default: 60 seconds
member.returns: True if element is visible or false if element is not visible.

member.name: M:UI.Helpers.WebElementExtensions.WeIsElementClickable(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement,OpenQA.Selenium.IWebDriver,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if element is clickable in DOM by its locator.
member.param: Locator pointing to the web element.
Time in seconds to wait for element become clickable. Default: 60 seconds
member.returns: True if element is clickable or false if element is not clickable.
